UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli PCM 2057(MIC=>1000µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus PCM 1944(MIC=>1000µg/ml),Escherichia coli PCM 2057(MIC=>1000µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus PCM 1944(MIC=60µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus ATCC 4698(MIC=150µg/ml)
